author: cms-l1t-offline
body:
This is a 80x PR for making L1T tower-counting algo in Layer2 configurable.

Make configurable the already existing tower counting algorithm in Layer2.
Now can set egBypassEGVetos and jetBypassPUS to or 1.
They are set to 1 in caloStage2Params_2016_v3_4_cfi.py, which is set to default configuration.
This is a 80x PR for L1T tower-counting algo in Layer2
title: Pr80x configurable tower-count algo in CaloLayer2
